Package it.polimi.ingsw.ui.cli.view

Class CliInput

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.ui.cli.view.CliInput
public class CliInput
extends java.lang.Object
This class is a class used to get the input of the client with a interruptible style which permits to the application to be more responsive when a server message arrives and to reduce unwanted graphical bugs.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int timeout  
    private boolean timeoutActive  
    private java.lang.Object timeoutLock  
    private int timeoutUndo  
    private int timePassed  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    CliInput()
    It creates a Cli input getter without a timeout active.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void dropTimeout()
    It deletes the current timeout active for this input getter.
    Command getInput()
    This method gets the input of the user when it writes it and enter \n
    boolean getUndo()
    This method gets the user undo it writes it and enter \n
    private void resetInsertedInput()
    It deletes every input sent by the user to the Cli when he shouldn't do it.
    void setTimeout()
    It sets the timeout.

    • CliInput

      public CliInput()

  • Method Details

    • setTimeout

      public void setTimeout()
      It sets the timeout.

    • getInput

      public Command getInput() throws UserInputTimeoutException, java.io.IOException
      This method gets the input of the user when it writes it and enter \n
      Returns:
      the command inserted by the user
      Throws:
      UserInputTimeoutException - if the user hasn't written something when there is a server message to read
      java.io.IOException - if there has been an error to access stdin

    • getUndo

      public boolean getUndo() throws java.io.IOException
      This method gets the user undo it writes it and enter \n
      Returns:
      the command inserted by the user
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there has been an error to access stdin

    • dropTimeout

      private void dropTimeout()
      It deletes the current timeout active for this input getter.

    • resetInsertedInput

      private void resetInsertedInput() throws java.io.IOException
      It deletes every input sent by the user to the Cli when he shouldn't do it.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there has been an error to access stdin
